About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

  • CSE Sophomore at NIT Hamirpur
  • Secondary & Senior Secondary education from DAV Public School
  • Familiar with C, C++, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript & adding...

Campus Ambassador at Code For Cause

Code For Cause is an initiative to help the community by providing training, guidance and awareness about the possibilities in the software field to students & professionals.

Executive Member at Team Finance Hillf'fair NITH

Team Finance is functional during the Annual Cultural-fest of NITH i.e. Hillf'fair and manages all the funds related to the cultural-fest.

Executive member at Team .EXE NITH

Team .EXE is departmental team of CSE which showcases its projects on annual Tech-Fest of NITH i.e. NIMBUS.
